statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT dish_name, price FROM sales_data WHERE cuisine_id = 1;
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT dish_name, sales_count FROM sales_data WHERE price > 20;
SELECT dish_name, price FROM sales_data WHERE sales_count > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_count ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT dish_name, sales_count FROM sales_data WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 20
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE cuisine_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT cuisine_id, SUM(price) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY cuisine_id HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY cuisine_id
SELECT * FROM cuisine_sales;
SELECT cuisine_name, total_sales FROM cuisine_sales ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT cuisine_name, total_sales FROM cuisine_sales WHERE total_sales > 1000;
SELECT cuisine_name, total_sales FROM cuisine_sales WHERE cuisine_name LIKE 'Italian%';
SELECT dish_name, sales_count FROM dish_popularity ORDER BY sales_count DESC;
SELECT cuisine_name, total_sales FROM cuisine_sales
SELECT dish_name, sales_count FROM dish_popularity
SELECT cuisine_name, total_sales, dish_name, sales_count FROM cuisine_sales JOIN dish_popularity ON cuisine_sales.cuisine_id = dish_popularity.cuisine_id
SELECT cuisine_name, total_sales FROM cuisine_sales ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT dish_name, sales_count FROM dish_popularity WHERE sales_count > 100
SELECT * FROM cuisines;
SELECT cuisine_name FROM cuisines ORDER BY cuisine_name DESC;
SELECT dish_name, price FROM dishes WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity >= 5 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT cuisine_name, COUNT(dish_id) as total_dishes FROM cuisines LEFT JOIN dishes ON cuisines.cuisine_id = dishes.cuisine_id GROUP BY cuisine_name ORDER BY total_dishes DESC;
SELECT * FROM cuisines;
SELECT dish_name, price FROM dishes WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT cuisine_name FROM cuisines WHERE cuisine_id = 2;
SELECT dish_name, sale_date, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT cuisine_name, dish_name, price, quantity FROM cuisines INNER JOIN dishes ON cuisines.cuisine_id = dishes.cuisine_id INNER JOIN sales_data ON dishes.dish_id = sales_data.dish_id;
SELECT * FROM cuisine ORDER BY cuisine_name DESC;
SELECT dish_name, cuisine_id, price FROM dish WHERE price < 50;
SELECT dish_name, price FROM dish WHERE cuisine_id = 2 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_date, quantity FROM sales WHERE quantity >= 10 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT dish_name, popularity_rank FROM popular_dish JOIN dish ON popular_dish.dish_id = dish.id WHERE popularity_rank > 3 ORDER BY popularity_rank ASC;
SELECT cuisine_name, cuisine_type FROM cuisine
SELECT dish_name, price, cuisine_id FROM dish ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT dish_name, count(quantity) AS total_sales FROM dish JOIN sales ON dish.id = sales.dish_id GROUP BY dish_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT dish_name, popularity_rank FROM dish JOIN popular_dish ON dish.id = popular_dish.dish_id ORDER BY popularity_rank DESC
SELECT cuisine_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM dish JOIN cuisine ON dish.cuisine_id = cuisine.id GROUP BY cuisine_name
SELECT name, region FROM Cuisine WHERE region='Italian'
SELECT * FROM Dish WHERE price > 50
SELECT name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, quantity, order_date FROM Order ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT id, rating, comment FROM Feedback
SELECT * FROM Cuisine WHERE region = 'Italian' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, price FROM Dish WHERE rating > 4.0 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT c.name AS cuisine_name, d.name AS dish_name, d.price FROM Cuisine c JOIN Dish d ON c.id = d.cuisine_id WHERE c.region = 'Asian' AND d.price < 20.00
SELECT o.order_date, c.name AS customer_name, d.name AS dish_name FROM Order o JOIN Customer c ON o.id = c.id JOIN Dish d ON o.dish_id = d.id WHERE c.email = 'example@email.com'
SELECT f.id, f.rating, f.comment, d.name AS dish_name FROM Feedback f JOIN Order o ON f.order_id = o.id JOIN Dish d ON o.dish_id = d.id WHERE f.rating >= 3.0
